summary: WARPING ROTORS ON DODGE DAKOTA.  I AM ON MY THIRD PAIR OF ROTOR'S WHICH ARE ALSO WARPED.  THE DEALER HAS TOLD ME IT IS THE WAY I DRIVE.  I AM SORRY, BUT I DRIVE MY COMPANY VAN A LOT HARDER THAN I DRIVE MY TRUCK, AND IT HAS NOT HAD A PROBLEM WITH WARPING ROTOR'S.  THIS KIND OF THING REALLY MAKES ME WANT TO BY ANOTHER DODGE, "NOT". *JB
